## Overview

Use the BodyWeight dataset in R. It describes the weight and diet of rats over time

Aim: describe the weight trajectories over time, and predict this by the diet.

```{r}
library(nlme)
data(BodyWeight)
dat <- BodyWeight

# Inspect dataset
head(dat)
summary(dat)
```
